title: I have lived in Wilmington for 44years. I also grew up in Forest Hills. We have always heard of the house at 1101 Country Club Rd is extremly haunted. Had a new couple move in it 3 years ago. They stayed 6 weeks and had to leave. Lots of people over at least the past 15years that live there, leave shortly after. The neighbors all are given the exact same reason! GHOSTS!Check into it if you can. thanks
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=14441
